## The Maier Lab

The Maier Lab is located at LMU Munich under the supervision of Prof. Markus Maier.

## Micro-Psychokinesis

Micro-Psychokinesis (Micro-Pk) describes a mental influence on probabilistic systems, e.g. quantum random number generators (qRNGs).

## The Lab Report

This website aims to provide a constantly updated overview of all Micro-Pk experiments conducted at the Maier Lab and their results. This effort is directed to counter biases reslting from selective publication of results.
